metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5419 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
If a malicious site repeatedly triggers a modal authentication prompt, eventually the browser UI will become non-responsive, requiring shutdown through the operating system. This is a denial of service (DOS) attack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52 and Thunderbird < 52.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
